summary:
ProSiebenSat.1 is the home of popular entertainment and digital consumer brands. Having been Group CEO of ProSiebenSat.1 since November 2022, I aim to drive our transformation into a digital group day by day – together with my almost 8,000 passionate team members around the globe.

Working in media all my professional life has taught me that a clear vision but at the same time being agile in the day-to-day execution are one of the most important parts to being successful. I am an energetic leader that derives great satisfaction in building highly effective teams by clear goal setting and building true human connections, using a hands-on commercial approach. I need to get things done using my strategic and analytical skillset and actively managing clarity in goal setting with strong communication skills. I am experienced in both leading established and new businesses where I see opportunities instead of roadblocks. I am in it for the long run and like being ahead of the game in an industry that is in a constant state of change.

As the former CEO of RTL Group, I gathered experience in leading global media companies as well as extensive know-how in launching and expanding streaming video services across multiple countries. At RTL Group, I was responsible for the strategic direction and operational excellence of the Broadcast, TV Production and Digital Business divisions. I launched the streaming video service Videoland on the Dutch market, followed by the roll-out of streaming services across RTL Group. 

Before that, I was CEO of RTL Nederland from 2008 to 2017. During that time, I transformed the company from a traditional television broadcaster into an omnichannel media and entertainment company – all while maintaining its market leadership. 

In addition, my experience is underlined by several memberships on boards of directors and supervisory boards in the international media landscape and my diverse entrepreneurial interests ranging from digital innovation to software and new technologies.
